DOC.detailed_description: For prospective study , 50 individual select , skeletal discrepancy randomly divide two group : 1 - accelerate tooth movement technique ( ATMT ) 2 - Control . Orthodontic record do two time , initial preoperative ; Gingival Crevicular Fluid sample collect use periopapers 7 time . Flapless cortical perforation make ATMT Group dental extraction . Surgical protocol flapless preserve periodontal health . After extraction space closure , result achieve cytokine measurement ( CCL2/MCP-1 , CCL3/MIP-1 alpha , CCL5/RANTES , CXCL8/IL8 , IL-1 alpha , IL-1 beta , IL6 , TNF-alpha ; TRANCE/RANK L , TNF RII ) do use Luminex Assays cytometer flow . After collect data , result statistically analyze .
DOC.criteria: Adolescent adult subject age 1655 year old , good general health , adult complete dentition , regardless presence third molar . Indication orthognathic surgery Tooth extraction indication orthodontic treatment Do smoke Periodontal teeth healthy Do use bisphosphonates corticosteroid Surgically assist rapid palatal expansion indication Cleft lip palate Craniofacial syndrome Mental disorder
